attributes.action: make it easier for under 16's to get a job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to make it easier for under 16 year olds to get a job. there are to many restictions, also teenagers need money to go out, and as prices are rising for every thing, teenagers need money. it is to hard for a teenager to get a job unless it is a paper round, and these are pointless. Also there are not always enough rounds for every teenager to do.
